content:
To normalize the provided profile data according to the specified guidelines, I'll follow the normalization instructions for each relevant field. Here's how the process will be applied to the input profile:

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Sr. Software Eng.",
  "location": "SF, CA",
  "key_skills": [
    "Python",
    "Data Analysis",
    "Proj. Management"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc",
      "title": "Lead Software Eng.",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Jr. Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 8 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, CA"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "Python",
    "Data Analysis",
    "Project Management"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc.",
      "title": "Lead Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Junior Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 8 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Standardized SF to full city name; Expanded abbreviations in job titles; Added period to company name."
}
```

### Explanation of Changes
1. **Title Normalization**: 
   - "Sr. Software Eng." was expanded to "Senior Software Engineer".
   - "Proj. Management" was expanded to "Project Management".

2. **Location Normalization**: 
   - "SF, CA" was expanded to "San Francisco, California, United States".
   - "San Francisco" and "San Francisco, CA" were standardized to "San Francisco, California, United States".

3. **Company Name Normalization**:
   - "Tech Solutions Inc" was updated to "Tech Solutions Inc." to standardize the abbreviation.

4. **Experience Title Normalization**:
   - "Lead Software Eng." was expanded to "Lead Software Engineer".
   - "Jr. Developer" was expanded to "Junior Developer".

5. **Date Normalization**:
   - Dates were converted to ISO format: "March 2018" to "2018-03", "June 2015" to "2015-06", and "February 2018" to "2018-02".

6. **Normalization Notes**:
   - Added a note to explain the changes made, particularly for location and title expansions.

This normalized profile maintains the semantic meaning of the original data while ensuring consistency and standardization across all fields.
